refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the internal storage size of the named field

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
intpg_field_size resourceresult intfield_number
pg_field_size returns the internal storage size (in bytes) of the field number in the given PostgreSQL result.
This function used to be called pg_fieldsize.

&reftitle.parameters;
result
PostgreSQL query result resource, returned by pg_query, pg_query_params or pg_execute (among others).
field_number
Field number, starting from 0.
